  <h2> <font size="-1"> org.jsoup.nodes</font> <br> Class Entities</h2> 
  <pre>
<a href="http://java.sun.com/j2se/1.5.0/docs/api/java/lang/Object.html?is-external=true" title="class or interface in java.lang">java.lang.Object</a>
  <img src="../../../resources/inherit.gif" alt="extended by "><b>org.jsoup.nodes.Entities</b>
</pre> 
  <hr> 
  <dl> 
   <dt>
    <pre>public class <b>Entities</b>
     <dt>
      extends 
      <a href="http://java.sun.com/j2se/1.5.0/docs/api/java/lang/Object.html?is-external=true" title="class or interface in java.lang">Object</a>
     </dt></pre>
   </dt>
  </dl>  
  <p> HTML entities, and escape routines. Source: <a href="http://www.w3.org/TR/html5/named-character-references.html#named-character-references">W3C HTML named character references</a>. </p>
  <p> </p>
  <p> </p>
  <hr> 
  <p>

  <a name="isNamedEntity(java.lang.String)">
   <!-- --></a>
  <h3> isNamedEntity</h3> 
  <pre>
public static boolean <b>isNamedEntity</b>(<a href="http://java.sun.com/j2se/1.5.0/docs/api/java/lang/String.html?is-external=true" title="class or interface in java.lang">String</a>&nbsp;name)</pre> 
  <dl> 
   <dd>
    Check if the input is a known named entity 
    <p> </p>
   </dd>
   <dd>
    <dl> 
     <dt>
      <b>Parameters:</b>
     </dt>
     <dd>
      <code>name</code> - the possible entity name (e.g. "lt" or "amp") 
     </dd>
     <dt>
      <b>Returns:</b>
     </dt>
     <dd>
      true if a known named entity
     </dd>
    </dl> 
   </dd> 
  </dl> 
  <hr> 
  <a name="isBaseNamedEntity(java.lang.String)">
   <!-- --></a>
  <h3> isBaseNamedEntity</h3> 
  <pre>
public static boolean <b>isBaseNamedEntity</b>(<a href="http://java.sun.com/j2se/1.5.0/docs/api/java/lang/String.html?is-external=true" title="class or interface in java.lang">String</a>&nbsp;name)</pre> 
  <dl> 
   <dd>
    Check if the input is a known named entity in the base entity set. 
    <p> </p>
   </dd>
   <dd>
    <dl> 
     <dt>
      <b>Parameters:</b>
     </dt>
     <dd>
      <code>name</code> - the possible entity name (e.g. "lt" or "amp") 
     </dd>
     <dt>
      <b>Returns:</b>
     </dt>
     <dd>
      true if a known named entity in the base set
     </dd>
     <dt>
      <b>See Also:</b>
     </dt>
     <dd>
      <a href="../../../org/jsoup/nodes/Entities.html#isNamedEntity(java.lang.String)"><code>isNamedEntity(String)</code></a>
     </dd>
    </dl> 
   </dd> 
  </dl> 
  <hr> 
  <a name="getCharacterByName(java.lang.String)">
   <!-- --></a>
  <h3> getCharacterByName</h3> 
  <pre>
public static <a href="http://java.sun.com/j2se/1.5.0/docs/api/java/lang/Character.html?is-external=true" title="class or interface in java.lang">Character</a> <b>getCharacterByName</b>(<a href="http://java.sun.com/j2se/1.5.0/docs/api/java/lang/String.html?is-external=true" title="class or interface in java.lang">String</a>&nbsp;name)</pre> 
  <dl> 
   <dd>
    Get the Character value of the named entity 
    <p> </p>
   </dd>
   <dd>
    <dl> 
     <dt>
      <b>Parameters:</b>
     </dt>
     <dd>
      <code>name</code> - named entity (e.g. "lt" or "amp") 
     </dd>
     <dt>
      <b>Returns:</b>
     </dt>
     <dd>
      the Character value of the named entity (e.g. '&lt;' or '&amp;')
     </dd>
    </dl> 
   </dd> 
  </dl>
